description: Restricted Bash shell, equivalent to bash --restricted. Does not permit changing the working directory, redirecting command output, or modifying environment variables, among other things. See also histexpand for history expansion. More information: https://www.gnu.org/software/bash/manual/html_node/The-Restricted-Shell.

useCases.description: Execute a command and then exit:
Execute a script, printing each command before executing it:
Execute commands from a script, stopping at the first error:
Read and execute commands from stdin:
